transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Executive: Ha ji sir good morning, mai Vidira bol rahi hu Indiamart head office se.
Customer: Ha sir actually kya hai na aapne jo hai fir se apna wo video meet me interest show kiya tha aapko like video meet.
Customer: Ha. Video meeting isliye karni thi ki jo apne mail apne the na wo login nahi ho rahe.
Executive: Mail nahi login ho rahe matlab kaunse mail sir?
Customer: Jo apni website ki mail ID hai na.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wo mail ID jo hai ye maine mobile change kiya to usme wo login nahi ho rahe.
Executive: Okay. Ab dekhiye maine aapko jo directors@shrinathtrading company wali mail nahi login ho rahi aapki?
Customer: Director wali, purchase wali, sale wali wo teeno charo hi nahi ho rahi hai. Info wali.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Info, sales koi wali bhi nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Director wali to ho gayi. Wo jo info, sales aur purchase wali hai wo nahi ho rahi.
Executive: Aur yaha pe koi bhi login nahi ho raha to aap ek kaam kariye mai aapko whatsapp pe link share kar rahi hu. Uska password to aapke paas hai hoga hi na sir tabhi login credentials.
Customer: Password hai par wo password nahi maang raha hai. Director wali to ho gayi hai but wo password nahi maang raha hai wo verification code maang raha hai jo wo aa nahi raha hai usme. To mail login nahi hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Ha to wo mail pe login ID bhej raha hai wo matlab OTP aa gaya to wo.
Customer: Aapka jo verification ha wo code isi aapke primary number jo ispe maine call kiya 246 isi pe hi to aayega OTP.
Executive: Nahi aa raha hai. Nahi aa raha hai. Nahi aata to mai fir wo call karta.
Executive: Ha nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Mai ek baar check karwa deti hu. Directors wali chal rahi hai. Info aur marketing.
Customer: Director wali hai to chal rahi hai. Wo kya hai pichli baar bhi ye issue aaya tha. To jo pehle manager thi unhone kya wo kisi aur ko line pe leke jo ye mail ka dekhte hai. Ha. To wo us hisab se unhone login karwaya tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ji bilkul wo mujhe bhi check karana padega backend team ye sari cheeze dekhti hai to unse baat karni padegi credentials.
Customer: Aap unse baat kar lijiye credentials wagera sabki aur uske baad jo hai na apna matlab aap mujhe fir thoda late call kijiyega. 1 baje baad lunch baad.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Lunch baje baad ha. Lunch ke baad matlab 1-1:30 baje baad. Kyuki kya system pe mai rahunga nahi. Ha. To fir wo system pe hi hoga pura kaam mobile pe to hoga nahi uska.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: To aap mujhe se ye bataiye yaha pe ki jo hai iske baad se jo bhi jaise uske alawa aur to koi mail ID ke alawa ka to aur koi issue nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi mail ID ke alawa issue nahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Char me se credentials yani aapko verification code nahi ja raha hai hai na baki password aur baki cheeze to aapke paas hai right?
Customer: Password sab malum hai wo password maang hi nahi raha hai login ke liye jab apan dusra account add kar rahe hai to wo bas seedha verification code bol raha hai ki jis bhi mail ID se dal rahe hai us mail ID me wo ja raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Okay okay okay to matlab mujhe unko call karke bolna hai ki aapka sab charo mail ID sab access credentials sab unke paas hai but verification code nahi receive ho raha hai unke primary number pe right?
Customer: Ha ha. Wo mail pe ja raha hai. Mail pe ja raha hai aur mail login hi nahi hai to mail se kaise nikalenge. Aur wo kya hai director pe bhi nahi ja raha hai.
Executive: Aap samajh rahe hai na mam aapka mail ID jab tak aapko aap jis bhi mail ID pe aapko mail aayega aur login nahi hoga to aap usse kaise dekh sakenge mail?
Customer: Ha nahi dekh sakte.
Customer: Aur wo jo credentials hai na credentials aur jo bhi ye password hai na wo usi mail ID pe bhej raha hai. Jis mail ID ko apan login kar rahe hai.
Executive: Okay okay got it got it. Aap samjhe aap meri baat.
Customer: Ha ha ha to wo wo mobile pe nahi bhej raha hai.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Wo mobile pe nahi bhej raha hai. Mobile pe bhejta to code aa jata. Na whatsapp pe bhej raha hai na normal text kar raha hai wo seedha sa usi mail ID pe bhej raha hai jis mail ID me apan login kar rahe hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Usi mail ID pe bhej raha hai.
Executive: Okay okay usi mail ID pe bhej raha hai to jab open hi nahi ho raha to hum waha se verify. Ha agar login hi nahi hai to open kaise aayega. Login hi nahi hai to fir wo kaise aayega. Mail login karne ke liye to usse apan maang rahe hai to verification code wo same mail pe hi bhej raha hai jiska login kar rahe hai. Wo password nahi maang raha hai.
Customer: Ha ha. Password maange to password to mere ko yaad hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha. But wo sirf wo verification code maang raha hai.
Executive: Verification. Wo kya hai multiple device pe login tha pehle to wo ab ya to wo backend team jo bhi karegi wo apne hisab se wo backend team ka hi kaam hai isme. Aap unse connect karwaiyega to kaam hoga.
Executive: Ah theek hai mai aapko 1 baje ke baad connect karti hu. Fir mai tab tak unse baat kar lungi ki.
Customer: Ha 1 baje baad baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Ha aap unse thoda samjha dijiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm. To us hisab se. Kyuki usme kya hai other way login ka option jo kar rahe hai na to usme wo bata raha hai backup code. Ab wo backup code jo the wo to login unhone save karwaye the but wo system bhi maine change kiya tha to wo bhi backup nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ha.
Customer: To wo kya mere paas option nahi hai abhi kuch login karne ka.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai mai baat karke aapko 1 baje ke baad call karke batati hu theek hai.
Customer: Ha 1 baje ke baad aap kariye. Kyuki wo kya waise bhi wo bolenge ki unko lena padega call pe apne ko video meeting pe to wo instruction dete jayenge last time jaise wo ho jayega.
Executive: Okay okay okay mai baat karke aapko karti hu call.
Customer: Issue to chota sa hai but wo karenge backend team wale. Aapke aur mere dono ka wo solution karna padega.
Executive: Nahi ho payega ha. Wo IT team hi karegi na fir. Ha nahi wo IT team hi karegi na wo unko jo hai na unko hi hai. Kyuki last time bhi aaya tha ye to wo madam ne unko line pe liya tha. Hmm hmm. To unhone na bola tha aisa aisa aisa kariye ek actually kya hai ek admin ki jo rehti hai na wo unke paas rehti hai login credentials. Hmm. To wo uske hisab se wo OTP wagera de denge apne ko to wo ho jayega. Hmm hmm. Ha.
Executive: Okay. Aap ek baar kar lijiye. Jo bhi hota hai fir mere ko aap 1 baje baad call kijiye to apan video meeting se. Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Ha theek hai mai karti hu. Director wali pe aap link director wali pe bhejenge to koi issue nahi hai wo to aa jayega. Hmm hmm. Zoom meeting ka link to director. Ha ha. Ha ha director wala to chalu hai but wo jo hai na dusri jo teen ID hai sales info aur ek aur sales info aur purchase.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Ha aur jo admin wali hai na to admin wali ka login creation jo rehta hai wo backend team ke paas hi rehta hai. Hmm. To uske through wo log kya karenge login karwa denge.
Executive: Ji ji theek hai theek hai mai baat karti hu.
Customer: Ha aap ek baar baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Hmm okay sir okay okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to login to multiple email accounts.

- Not receiving verification code on primary number.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect with backend team.

- Will call back after 1 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back after speaking with team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email login, verification code, backend team, credentials
